messages.subject: Commercial message, Christmas sale on fittings, and Katana added to my site.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys/Gals, I have just lowered the prices on my fittings (some papered), and I have just added a fully restored 30 inch Echizen katana to my site. The
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys/Gals,
I have just lowered the prices on my fittings (some papered), and I
have just added a fully restored 30 inch Echizen katana to my site.
The katana is outstanding, so please check it out if you get a
chance. The blade actually has a deep dark colour to it.

Sorry for the bluish colour of the pictures, I have to do some
alterations to my photo process. I will be adding more natural
colour photos this weekend.

http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/shige/shige.html

Thanks very much for looking.


Louis Skebo
www.japaneseswordcollector.com
